short_summary: Temporary Help Services for 1 Senior Special Advisor
description: Temporary help services for 1 senior special advisor for Department of National Defense with a requirement to access 'Top Secret' resources
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement

#### Overview

The Department of National Defense (DND) is soliciting proposals for Temporary Help Services under the Supply Arrangement (EN578-172870) for Special Advisor (SA) qualified suppliers.

#### Requirements

The supplied services are required for the Department of National Defense (DND) in the National Capital Region (NCR). The services are for a Senior Special Advisor and will involve providing temporary help services to meet the department's requirements.

#### Eligible Suppliers

The following SA holders have been invited to submit a proposal:

* 1019837 Ontario Inc.
* 12532778 CANADA Inc.
* ADRM Technology Consulting Group Corp.
* Akkada Professional Services Inc.
* Calian Ltd.
* Excel Human Resources Inc.
* Fifalde Consulting Inc.
* HubSpoke Inc.
* IBISKA Telecom Inc.
* QMR Staffing Solutions Incorporated
* Quarry Consulting Inc.
* Randstad Interim Inc.
* Raymond Chabot Grant Thornton Consulting Inc.
* The AIM Group Inc.
* Tiree Facility Solutions Inc.

#### Description of the Requirement

This requirement is for Temporary Help Services. Suppliers must be qualified under the Special Advisor (SA) stream and category to meet the department's requirements.

#### Level of Security

The minimum security level required for the supplied services is Top Secret.

#### Tender Submissions

Tender submissions must be made in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Supply Arrangement (EN578-172870). A request for proposal document can be downloaded from the Government of Canada's tendering website.

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
Temporary Help
Phone: (613) 971-7955
Email: [CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca](mailto:CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca)
Attachment/piece jointe:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4618/s4378111-rfp_0.pdf or
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4618/s4378111-dp_0.pdf (French)

**Closing Date and Time**

The closing date and time for the tender submissions are April 12, 2023 at 12:00.

---

Gategoriés:

* Services d'aide
